channel.title: 1.3 Emperion | PvP | Premium | Netzwerk | HungerGames
channel.description:
[center][img]http://emperion.eu/images/Header2.png[/img][/center]
Welcome on Emperion.eu - Minecraft Server Network
We give you a lot of different Minecraft Server.
[ul][*]HungerGames Server [online] – IP: hg1.emperion.eu [*]Premium only PvP Server [online] – IP: pvp.emperion.eu [*]City Build Server [not online yet] – IP: cb.emperion.eu [*]Cracked PvP Server [Online] – IP: cracked.emperion.eu
HungerGames: There are multiple Servers that everybody will be able to join a Server. At the beginning everybody will get a Kit (/kit). We develop our own Plugins to get the best Game Experience for our Players. hg1.emperion.eu
Premium Only PvP Server: Perfect Game Experience because of our own Plugins! You can make your own /clan and you can compare with your Opponents with Kill/Death Statics. Nobody is able to logout during a fight! pvp.emperion.eu
Cracked PvP Server: This Server is just like the other (Premium) PvP Server. But it has a few less Features and it is opened for cracked Users. If you have bought Minecraft our Plugins will automatically detect that and you don`t need to use /register or /login
City Build Server: Currently we are working on it!
Server Information: 64 Gb Ram
Intel Core i7 Prozessor HexaCore[/ul]

item.description:
@Salzstange wrote:

[center][/center]

Welcome on Emperion.eu - Minecraft Server Network

We give you a lot of different Minecraft Server.

[ul][]HungerGames Server [online] – IP: hg1.emperion.eu
[]Premium only PvP Server [online] – IP: pvp.emperion.eu
[]City Build Server [not online yet] – IP: cb.emperion.eu
[]Cracked PvP Server [Online] – IP: cracked.emperion.eu

HungerGames:
There are multiple Servers that everybody will be able to join a Server.
At the beginning everybody will get a Kit (/kit). We develop our own Plugins to get the best Game Experience for our Players.
hg1.emperion.eu

Premium Only PvP Server:
Perfect Game Experience because of our own Plugins! You can make your own /clan and you can compare with your Opponents with Kill/Death Statics. Nobody is able to logout during a fight!
pvp.emperion.eu

Cracked PvP Server:
This Server is just like the other (Premium) PvP Server. But it has a few less Features and it is opened for cracked Users. If you have bought Minecraft our Plugins will automatically detect that and you don`t need to use /register or /login

City Build Server:
Currently we are working on it!

64 Gb Ram

Intel Core i7 Prozessor HexaCore[/ul]
